altTitles.ja: 14　ジューシー
ジューシー (亜桜まる)

description.en:
Short random school life chapters about a group of girls who attend Watermelon Junior High.

The Doujinshi & Manga Lexicon
[Vol. 1](https://www.doujinshi.org/book/258357/14/)
[Vol. 2](https://www.doujinshi.org/book/258356/14-2/)

My boyfriend is getting married. To my own sister, no less. I could handle the breakup. Betrayal was nothing new. But accepting the fact that once again my sister stole what was mine proved to be unbearable. In the midst of this heart-wrenching time, I encountered Yunhwan…

altTitles.ja: らんま1/2

altTitles.th: รันม่า ½ ไอ้หนุ่มกังฟู

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

Soun was disappointed to find that Ranma was a girl. However, when Ranma got out of the bath, he turned into a boy and the panda turned into Ranma's father, Genma. The two had fallen into a fountain during their training in China, a fountain that turned them into a woman and panda respectively when they touched the water. 

The Tendo family is initially in turmoil, including Akane, who has become a prospective bride, as they face the troublesome duo who go back and forth between man and woman, human and panda, although they can be restored to their original state if they are bathed in hot water. 

This is the first volume of a new edition of the popular manga.


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/ranma-1-2)
- Indonesian release by Elex Media
description.pt-br: Ranma Saotome foi treinado desde a infância até aos 16 anos. É estudante de artes marciais que, junto ao pai, Genma Saotome, fez uma jornada de treinamento nas Montanhas Bayan Har Shan, na Província de Qinghai, na China. Ali há o campo de treinamento chamado Jusenkyo onde existem diversas fontes amaldiçoadas. Cada uma delas está associada à história de alguém que morreu afogado há centenas ou milhares de anos e quem cair em uma delas transforma-se no ser que morreu afogado nela, seja ele humano ou não.  No meio do treinamento, Ranma e seu pai caem, cada um em uma fonte diferente, e acabam amaldiçoados. Depois desse incidente, toda vez que Ranma se molha com água fria, transforma-se em uma bela garota, enquanto seu pai em um enorme panda. Somente o banho com água quente pode reverter os personagens à sua forma original, ainda que temporariamente.

altTitles.ja: To LOVEる -とらぶる- ダークネス

description.en:
Rito Yuuki continues to be caught in over-the-top perverted scenarios, now uncensored. The alien Deviluke sisters - Lala, Momo, and Nana - still use their unique abilities in an attempt to grab Rito's love confession. Momo, in particular, has a vision: a harem of women all in love with Rito, with Momo herself in the center. After all, if everyone has an equal share of Rito, everyone wins - at least, she thinks.  
  
As she enacts this plan, the former alien mercenary Yami, aka Golden Darkness, struggles between her former life as a killer and her current life on Earth. Things get complicated when Mea, a girl with powers similar to Yami's, becomes interested in Rito. Just who is this new enemy?

altTitles.ja: 巨蟲山脈

description.en: A tunnel in a mountain that a college student visited with the intention of trying to deliver a video. The giant bugs that appeared there attacked them! VS. Human cruel survival.
description.ja: 東海地方G県にある有名なオカルトスポット“双子山岩トンネル”…行方不明者が絶えないというこの場所に、肝試しと称してVtube配信用の動画撮影にやってきた剛たち。だが、そこで遭遇したのはなんと巨大化した蟲だった!　犠牲者を出しながらも、昆虫学者・榎稲穂の助けを得て蟲を撃退し逃げるが…!?
description.vi: Địa điểm huyền bí nổi tiếng "Đường Hầm Núi Đá Đôi" ở quận G thuộc vùng Tokai... Jinguji và những người bạn cậu đến nơi này, nơi liên tục có dòng người mất tích, gọi đây là thử thách lòng can đảm để quay Video phân phối Vtube. Tuy nhiên, những gì cậu ấy gặp phải là những con côn trùng khổng lồ! Mặc dù gây ra thương vong, nhưng cậu ta vẫn xoay sở để chống lại lũ bọ với sự giúp đỡ của nhà côn trùng học Enoki và trốn thoát...!?

altTitles.ja: ほのスト！ ～豪炎寺のひとりごと～

description.en: An official *Inazuma Eleven* spin-off manga focusing on the casual daily life of Gouenji Shuuya, known as the "Flame Ace Striker" and shows what the cool collected Gouenji is thinking about.

altTitles.ja: 深夜食堂

description.en:
A manga that revolves around an old-fashioned all-night food stall, the various dishes that the stall owner prepares to suit the tastes of different customers, and the joys, griefs, trials and tribulations of his faithful patrons.  
  
- Nominated for the 2nd Manga Taisho Award (2009)  
- Winner of the 39th Japan Cartoonist Awards Grand Prize (2010)

title.en: "Omae Gotoki ga Maou ni Kateru to Omou na" to Yuusha Party wo Tsuihou Sareta node, Outo de Kimama ni Kurashitai

altTitles.ja: 「お前ごときが魔王に勝てると思うな」と勇者パーティを追放されたので、王都で気ままに暮らしたい THE COMIC

altTitles.en: Do You Think Someone Like You Can Defeat the Demon King?

altTitles.zh: 「就凭你也想打败魔王吗」被勇者一行所驱逐的少女要如何才能在王都过上自由的生活

altTitles.zh-hk: 「憑妳也想討伐魔王？」被勇者小隊逐出隊伍，只好在王都自在過活

altTitles.zh-ro: "Jiù píng nǐ yě xiǎng dǎbài mówáng ma" bèi yǒngzhě yīxíng suǒ qūzhú de shàonǚ yào rúhé cáinéng zài wáng dōuguò shàng zìyóu de shēnghuó

altTitles.en: ROLL OVER AND DIE: I Will Fight for an Ordinary Life with My Love and Cursed Sword!

altTitles.vi: Ngươi Nghĩ Một Kẻ Như Ngươi Có Thể Tiêu Diệt Quỷ Vương?

description.en:
According to the god Origin's prophecy, the girl Flum was chosen to be one of the members of the party that were foretold to defeat the Demon Lord. Everyone already had achievements to their name, as well as the strength to back them up. However, only Flum did not possess any combat prowess, and all of her stats were 0 due to her rare affinity. While being constantly berated, she continued to put great efforts to be useful to the heroes.     

Until one day, she was tricked by one of the party members who said that she “was not necessary anymore” and sold off to a slave trader. Flum was forced to live as a slave, locked away and barely fed. There she encountered a “cursed sword” and realized the true power of her rare affinity, “Reversal.”   The girl, who acquired the power to fight, was indifferent to the Demon Lord and decided to live peacefully as an adventurer alongside a slave girl she met.    

——This is a story of one girl who continued to crawl up from the very bottom in order to regain her peaceful everyday life.

title.en: The Ending, I Want to Change it

description.en: Byun Soo-ah, an impoverished novelist who only writes bad endings, is possessed by someone's curse as Choi Se-hwa, the villainess of 'End of Youth', which is currently being serialized. Can Su-ah survive and return to her original world in a novel full of traitors, sociopaths, double personalities, and psychopaths?
A story about twins who don't look alike.

title.en: Isekai Furin ll ~Michibika Reshi Hitodzuma Tachi to Bukiyo Tensei Yuusha~

altTitles.ja: 異世界不倫Ⅱ～導かれし人妻たちと不器用転生勇者～

description.en:
An office worker, Yuuto Aida, witnesses his wife's affair at home!  When he jumps out of the house, he gets hit by a truck and is reincarnated in another world as a hero!!  However, due to the misunderstanding about Goddess Reincarnation, he only had one skill, it was a skill that could captivate other people's wives!!

(MTL)
description.id: Suami sibuk bekerja Istri sibuk selingkuh, Seorang pekerja kantoran, Yuuto Aida, menyaksikan perselingkuhan istrinya di rumahnya! Ketika dia melompat keluar rumah, dia ditabrak truk dan bereinkarnasi di dunia lain sebagai pahlawan!! Namun, karena kesalahpahaman tentang Reinkarnasi Dewi, dia hanya punya satu skill, itu adalah skill yang dapat memikat istri orang lain!!
description.ja: ごくごく普通のサラリーマン・愛田勇人（あいだ　ゆうと）は、自宅で妻の浮気現場を目撃！家を飛び出したところ、“例のトラック”に轢かれ──勇者として異世界転生することに！！しかし、転生の女神のひょんな勘違いから、たったひとつのスキルだけを彼は手に入れることになった──　それは、“人妻完全魅了（チャーム）”というスキル！世の人妻は皆すべて、彼に魅了される！！！！

altTitles.ja: カウントラブル

description.en: A self-proclaimed angel decides to intervene with a boy's love life, starting with a timer on his arm which will count down every time his heart beats from interacting with his crush, starting from 10. At 0, the boy will confess everything he is thinking at that moment. But it only starts there! The 'angel' has powers based on the number 10, and grant him the ability to stop time, make someone fall in love with him, learn who others like, and more. With comedy, romance, and drama, this is not a typical shounen series and should not be passed up.

Yoon Geon Young is the ace pitcher of the Professional League baseball team, Embo Elephants. Since when did he start to notice Punz, the club’s elephant mascot?  
  
A mascot’s job is simply to cheer on the players. Why does Geon Young keep getting distracted by it?  
  
Something happened between him and Wonwoo, the man behind the elephant mascot, in the past. And so, the strange tension between these two men is gradually turning into a different feeling.

title.en: Issho Watashi no Joshu de ite!

altTitles.ja: 一生わたしの助手でいて！

description.en:
"The relationship between a detective and their assistant is not unlike romance!"

Due to his natural tendency to assist others (a "helper type" personality that makes him constantly want to lend a hand), Mitomo Tasuku had always lived in the shadows. To break out of this, he made it his life's mission to "become number one." However, at the high school he transfers to, he encounters three detective girls, who happen to be his rivals from elementary school with whom he formed a detective club together. Thus begins Tasuku's fierce battle for the top detective spot! However... these girls seem to harbor passionate feelings of a different kind...!?

title.en: Majo Taisen - 32-nin no Isai no Majo wa Koroshiau

altTitles.ja: 魔女大戦 32人の異才の魔女は殺し合う

description.en: Joan of Arc, the hero who saved France, was sentenced to be burned at the stake. But at the moment of her death, a demon sent her to another world. There, she found 32 women from across history, known as “witches.” With the addition of the final witch, Joan of Arc, Walpurgis Night begins: Only one witch can survive, and have her wish granted!
description.ja: フランスを救った奇跡の英雄ジャンヌ・ダルク。火刑に処され、その生涯を終えようとしていた彼女は死の間際、別世界へと飛ばされてしまう。そこにいたのはその名を歴史に刻み、「魔女」と呼ばれる32人の女傑たちであった。そして、最後の「魔女」ジャンヌダルクが揃い、欲深き魔女たちの殺し合い魔女千夜血戦の開幕が告げられるーー!!
description.ru: История о 32 исторических женщинах, в том числе Жанне д'Арк, Клеопатре, Томоэ Гозэн и Марии Антуанетте - названых «алчными ведьмами», сражающихся насмерть, ради исполнения своего желания.
description.uk: Тридцять дві відьми з усієї історії борються на смерть у Вальпургієву ніч, щоби виконати свої бажання. Жанна д'Арк, Клеопатра, Томое Ґодзен, Марія Антуанетта та інші.

altTitles.vi: Bắt nạt mình đi mà, nữ phản diện ơi!

altTitles.th: โปรดรังแกฉันทีคุณนางร้าย!

altTitles.zh-ro: Qǐng qīfù wǒ ba, è yì xiǎojiě!

altTitles.ru: Пожалуйста, поиздевайтесь надо мной, мисс Злодейка!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor, me humilhe, senhorita vilã!

altTitles.ar: !تنمرِ علي من فضلكِ يا أنسة الشر

altTitles.fr: Je vous en supplie madame l'antagoniste, Harcelez moi !

altTitles.ja: いじめてください、悪役令嬢様！

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

description.en:
The Immortals arrived 500 years ago. They were originally celebrated, even worshipped, but as they began to use humanity for their own ends they became reviled. Now, an immortal girl hunts for her own kind in their deep lairs to bring about the end of their reign of terror.  
  
**Note:** Winner of the Tsuruta Kenji Special Award in Afternoon's Winter 2016 Four Seasons Contest  
  
Links:  
- [Author's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=230470)  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/ShikiKouyuu)

altTitles.ja: ナナとカオル

description.en:
Kaoru is a 17-year-old virgin who has an SM fetish. He secretly dreams about an SM relationship with his childhood friend Nana. One day Kaoru's mom asks Nana to hide all his SM toys so he'll study for a change. However, Nana finds the leather one-piece that Kaoru bought and tries it on, but she accidentally locks it and doesn't have the key! The beginning of their super strange relationship.

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Official Raw - Young Animal](https://younganimal.com/series/b10a2a258e602/)
- [Alternative Official English - FAKKU](https://www.fakku.net/hentai/nana-kaoru-volume-1-english)

Gong Hyochan's world was turned upside down when he finally learned about his mother's terminal diagnosis. After all, they had no one else but each other in this whole world. He had always taken his mother's love for granted, but it was now too late to make amends. Or was it? A mysterious man approached him on his mother's bedside, offering to give his mother a new life at the cost of his own lifespan. The desperate Hyochan made the deal and 50 year-old Yeon Geum-ok was given a second chance in life. The catch? She was now younger than her own son!

altTitles.ja: スクールバック

description.en:
Fushimi-san, the janitor at a certain high school, cuts quite a figure. She's tall, cheerful, hard-working, and loves canned coffee. When the students at the school are going through times of trouble, pain, or confusion, she's there to lend a helping hand or a shoulder to cry on. When you feel like the adults in your life don't have your back... Fushimi-san probably will!

This wonderful slice of life by Onodera Kokoro follows various poignant stories of adolescence and the desire of young people to be seen and heard, especially when times are hard.

The story is about Miyagawa Shota, who just graduated from high school,
and left his hometown to work in the famous Tsurumoku Furniture factory
outside of Tokyo. In the company dorm, Shota is roomed with Tabatake,
the most senior resident of the dorm and the most obnoxious roommate,
and Sugimoto, the in-house Casanova. With these two roommates, Shota
is constantly caught in awkward situations. Although the manga addresses
the issues of making career and love quite seriously, it still succeeds in
remaining funny at the same time.

altTitles.ja: ハッピーバースデー、さよなら

description.en:
"Every morning, I give birth to an identical copy of myself."

This is a story of love and hate, set within a bizarre fantasy.

altTitles.ja: 理解のあるカレンちゃん

description.en:
“You’re amazing for being alive another day!”

A Manga about an understanding girlfriend who rewards you with a “log-in bonus” every day.
description.pt-br:
“Você é incrível por estar vivo mais um dia!”

Um mangá sobre uma namorada compreensiva que recompensa você com um “bônus de login” todos os dias.

altTitles.ja: イエヴァ
たゆたう煙は掴めない

description.en: Chiaki, a college student without a girlfriend, meets Miyako, a waitress at a shisha store, through a matching app recommended by a friend. This is a love story that lyrically depicts a faint love that begins with a matching app and shisha.
description.ja:
マッチングアプリで知り合ったのはシーシャが似合うヒト。

彼女いない歴＝年齢の平凡な大学生・千秋が軽い気持ちで始めたマッチングアプリ。そこで知り合ったのはシーシャカフェで働く少し年上の都。初めてのシーシャ体験に戸惑いつつも徐々にのめり込み、ミステリアスな彼女にも次第に惹かれていくも都は文字通り掴みどころがなく…。
description.pt-br: Chiaki, um estudante universitário sem namorada, conhece Miyako, uma garçonete de uma casa de shisha, através de um aplicativo de relacionamento recomendado por um amigo. Esta é uma história de amor que retrata poeticamente um sentimento inicial e delicado, nascido em um aplicativo de celular e embalado pelo aroma do shisha.

title.en: How the Little Brother Who Turned Into a Girl Became His Big Brother's Girlfriend

altTitles.ja: 兄貴の彼女になる、女の子になっちゃった弟。

altTitles.ja-ro: Aniki no Kanojo ni Naru, Onnanoko ni Nacchatta Otouto

altTitles.en: When I Returned Home for the First Time in a Long Time, My Brother Transformed Into a Girl

altTitles.ja: 久しぶりに実家に帰ったら弟がTSしてた。

altTitles.ja-ro: Hisashiburi ni Jikka ni Kaettara Otouto ga TS Shiteta.

altTitles.ru: Как Младший Братик, Который Превратился в Девочку, Стал Девушкой Своего Старшего Брата

description.en:
When I returned home for the first time in a long time, my little brother transformed into a girl!?

---

[Fantia 18+ Content](https://mangadex.org/title/7a23de9c-01b8-43bd-ac38-0bfe0bebcc3b)
description.id: Ketika aku pulang ke rumah setelah sekian lamanya adik tiri laki-laki ku berubah menjadi gadis!?
description.ru: Когда я вернулся домой в первый раз спустя долгое время, мой младший брат стал девушкой!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Mayoeru Shitsuji to Chikin na Ore to

altTitles.en: The Wavering Butler and Myself the Chicken

altTitles.ja: まよチキ!
迷える執事とチキンな俺と

description.en: Konoe Subaru, a classmate of Sakamachi Kinjirou, has been serving as the butler of Suzutsuki Kanade in school. Due to an accident, Sakamachi discovers Konoe's secret…that he is actually a she!? Apparently she will be removed from her position if anyone at school finds out. What will unfold from this chain of events?

title.en: A Story After Everything Went Well

altTitles.ja: ぜんぶうまくいった後の話

altTitles.pt-br: Uma história depois que tudo deu certo

description.en: A oneshot by taizan5 about a girl in a world where modern civilization has fallen and of which there is the existence of what are called "new humans".

title.en: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

altTitles.ja: 薫る花は凛と咲く

altTitles.es-la: La fragante flor florece con dignidad

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

altTitles.th: ดอกรักผลิบานที่กลางใจ

altTitles.ja: #薫る花

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana Wa Rin To Saku

altTitles.en: The Fragrant Flower Blooms With Dignity

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High. This is the story of two people who are so close and yet so far apart.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.fr:
Bien qu'ils soient mitoyens, le lycée public Chidori pour garçons et le prestigieux lycée privé pour filles Kikyō continuent à entretenir leur tradition de se haïr mutuellement au plus haut point. Tsumugi Rintarō pensait la même chose, jusqu'à ce qu'il fasse la rencontre de Wakuri Kaoruko, élève de Chidori et habituée de la pâtisserie tenue par ses parents. Malgré la désapprobation et les préjugés de leurs camarades respectifs, Rintarō et Kaoruko vont petit à petit se rapprocher, et tant pis ce qu'en pensent les autres !

___
**Liens :**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

title.en: Isekai de Café wo Kaiten Shimashita

altTitles.en: Opening a Café in Another World

altTitles.zh: 在异世界开咖啡厅了哟

altTitles.ja: 異世界でカフェを開店しました。

altTitles.fa: ایسکی د کافه ای کیتن شیماشیتا.

altTitles.th: เปิดร้านคาเฟ่ที่ต่างโลก

altTitles.zh-hk: 在異世界開咖啡廳了哟

description.en: Kurokawa Lisa is an ordinary office worker, who has practiced lots of cooking while living alone. One day, she wakes up in another world, with a concerned little spirit hovering over her! She has apparently been transported to a magical, spirit-filled realm by the will of the goddess, and there is no known way for her to go back. She is taken in by a wealthy couple, and they and her new spirit helper treat her with nothing but kindness. There is one problem, however–the food in this magical world is gross! Lisa insists on helping the household cooking staff prepare a traditional meal from her world, and it is a big hit with her hosts. Soon Lisa knows what she should do in this new world; she should open a café and treat everyone to delicious food!

altTitles.ja: 1♥9　イチ・らぶ・キュウ
1LOVE9
イチ・らぶ・キュウ
イチ♥らぶ♥キュウ

description.en: Takuma Miyabe is a boy from an island who moved to Tokyo because his island doesn't have a high school there. However, the ratio of male and female is 1:9. There are too many female students in his class, and as a result, they flirt with the still innocent Takuma.

altTitles.ja: デュアルな彼女の倒し方

altTitles.en: How to Beat a Dual Girlfriend

description.en: Shindou Yuuichi gets a girlfriend on his first day of high school. The only problem is that she used to bully him mercilessly in middle school and he can't figure out why she's suddenly decided to like him. The next day she seems like an entirely different person. That can't be right, can it?
description.id: Shindou Yuuichi, adalah seorang siswa dengan masalah komunikasi yang mencoba menjalani kehidupan sekolah yang slow life. Namun, keinginan itu dihalangi oleh Fukamori Shizuki, seorang gadis cantik, dan sekaligus pacarnya adalah penyebab masalah komunikasinya, inilah kehidupan kisah cinta komedi romantis ganda ♡♡
description.ru: Романтическая комедия про школьника, который постоянно проводит время с девушкой, чьё поведение разнится между грубиянкой и примерной девушкой. Молодому человеку предстоит выяснить - это раздвоение личности или просто притворство..?
description.pt-br:
Fukamori Shizuku, uma namorada monstruosa que deu o bote no meu primeiro dia de Ensino Médio. Cada dia que passo com essa mega dissimulada é no modo difícil por conta de algumas circunstâncias sérias!!!! 

Um Grande Problema! 

Uma comédia romântica XX dupla começa ♡♡

altTitles.ja: 元将軍のアンデッドナイト

description.en: Lambert, one of the great generals from Regios kingdom, was suspected of planning a rebellion against his lord at the end of unification war, and he died an unnatural death. Two hundred years later, when the era had changed and Regios kingdom had entered its peaceful era, he accidentally revived as a demon called Undead Knight… Lambert, whose entire body was wrapped in a flashy Demon Metal[Organ], set out on a journey to punish the wrongdoers while enjoying the peaceful sight of Regios kingdom. But… This peaceful era was basically an easy mode for Lambert, the greatest general of the chaotic era.

title.en: Inaka no Home Center Otoko no Jiyuu na Isekai Seikatsu

altTitles.en: The Home Improvement Store Employee Building An Agricultural Village In Another World

altTitles.zh: 农村家居男建设异世界新农村

altTitles.ja: 田舎のホームセンター男の自由な異世界生活

description.en:
Masaru is an ordinary middle-aged guy who does construction work on convenience stores and home centers.   
  
Reincarnated in a young body, bunch of low-quality skills but are good for his own profession, decides to do construction again, girls with rabbit ears, slow life.  
  
  
[Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4823do/) (Raw)
description.es-la: Masaru es un tipo ordinario de mediana edad que trabaja en tiendas de conveniencia y centros para el hogar haciendo trabajos de construcción. Reencarnado en un cuerpo joven, con varias habilidades de baja calidad pero buenas para su profesión, decide hacer construcción nuevamente, chicas con orejas de conejo y una vida lenta.

title.en: The Café Terrace and Its Goddesses

altTitles.ja: 女神のカフェテラス

description.en:
Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"! Hayato's unexpected life in a seaside town with these five girls of fate begins here!  
  
In this handsome harem under one roof by Koji Seo of *Suzuka*, *Kimi no Iru Machi*, and *Fuuka*, which girl will you fall in love with? A seaside love comedy with too many heroines!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10009/episode/319474) (U.S. Only)
description.ru: Спустя три года, после ссоры со своей бабушкой, Хаято Касукабэ возвращается в свой родной дом в котором поселилось пять девушек. Выясняется, что бабушка Хаято позволила девушкам жить в этом доме, а те заботились о ней до самой её смерти. Так начинается история Хаято и пяти "Богинь".
description.vi: Kasukabe Hayato đã được nhận vào Đại Học Tokyo ngay trong lần thi đầu tiên. Nhưng sau khi nhận được tin bà nội qua đời, anh trở về ngôi nhà thời thơ ấu của mình, quán cà phê Familia.  Và thấy 5 cô gái lạ mặt tự xưng là "Gia đình của bà"! Cuộc sống mới của Hayato tại một thị trấn ven biển với năm cô gái định mệnh bắt đầu từ đây!

title.en: I Turned off the Pain Perception Setting!

altTitles.en: I Said I Turned off the Pain Perception Setting!
I'm Telling You, I Already Turned off the Pain Perception Setting!
You Turned off the Pain Setting?
I Turned off the Pain Setting?

altTitles.ja: 100回目プレイヤーなので高好感度はエンリョします！

altTitles.es-la: ¿Se me ha olvidado desactivar la configuración del dolor?

description.en:
**Pain perception 0, capture rate is 100!**

A virtual reality game with pain perception set to '0'. I was the first to clear all endings, and started the final 100th playthrough... but something is off. Suddenly, I have a strange disease with a terminal setting, and the capture target characters are starting to worry about me.

"I don't feel any pain, so should I pretend to be sick?"

Before I knew it, to the capture target characters, I became a noble hero enduring pain and sacrificing for world peace. Since it has come to this, the concept for this playthrough is a terminally-ill hero throwing herself for the world! I must end it with a happy ending. This is my last playthrough in my life!
description.mn:
Өвдөлтийн мэдрэмж 0, Барих хувь 100!
Виртуал ертөнцийн тоглоомны өвдөлтийн мэдрэмжийн тохиргоог "0" болгосон. Би бүх төгсгөлийг нь дуусгасан цор ганц, тиймээс энэ бол миний 100 дахь оролдлого...гэхдээ сонин байна. Гэнэтхэн, эмчлэгдхээргүй өвчинтэй, бас гол дүрүүд миний төлөө санаа зовж эхэлсэн.
"Би ямар ч өвдөлт мэдрэхгүй болохоор, дүр эсгэх нь зөв юм болов уу?"
Намайг мэдхээс өмнө, энэ гол дүрүүдэд би энэ дэлхийн амар амгалангийн төлөө өөрийгөө золиослох баатар болчихсон байсан. Одоо өнгөрснөөс хойш, энэ оролдлогын концепц бол энэ ертөнцийн төлөө өөрийгөө золиослох! Би заавал аз жаргалтай төгсөх хэрэгтэй. Энэ бол миний сүүлчийн оролдлого!

altTitles.zh: 我的食物看起来很可爱

altTitles.en: My Food Seems to Be Very Cute

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ de shíwù kàn qǐlái hěn kě'ài

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的食物看起來很可愛

description.en: A vampire who has been sleeping for nearly two hundred years, Maria is awakened by a passing werewolf girl by a chance, and the moment the coffin is opened, the curse falls on the werewolf girl. The two girls set foot on the journey to the city
description.es-la: Maria, una vampiro que había estado durmiendo por casi doscientos años, es despertada por Xing Lan, una chica lobo que pasaba por ahí. Cuando el ataúd se abre, una maldición cae sobre Xing Lan. Sin embargo, en lugar de asustarse, la inocente Xing Lan cree haber encontrado una excelente compañera, y ambas embarcan juntas un viaje a la ciudad. Así comienza su historia.

title.en: From The Hero In His Past

description.en:
After the destruction and chaos, witnessing all the agony to an unimaginable scale, emptiness consumed him. Thus, he reverted the world to the past.

Source: MangaPlus
description.es:
Después de tanta destrucción y caos, de ver una agonía inimaginable, el vacío lo consumió. Por eso, decidió devolver el mundo al pasado.

Fuente: MangaPlus

altTitles.ja: アフターゴッド

description.en: Japan has been "invaded" by the gods. Tokyo, dwelling place of the gods, has been declared a "danger zone" and tightly sealed off by an impenetrable fence. A girl by the name of Waka keeps gazing beyond the fence's boundaries. Waka came to Tokyo from Saga in order to see her friend, but there she meets Tokinaga, a researcher who had been vigilantly guarding the city. It's this meeting that will change the fate of the world...

altTitles.ja: バカ女26時

description.en:
Atsuko and Yuri were classmates in elementary, junior high, high school, although they hardly ever spoke to each other during their school days. At their first reunion in 15 years, Atsuko discovers Yuri's secret and makes a move.

What is the destination of these two opposites, who have completely different interests and groups and whose personalities do not match?

In Tokyo, suspicious cases are occurring where the victims have all of their blood drained from them.  
Mikogami Keiji, a detective who also wants revenge for his lover, killed 10 years ago, pursues the culprit, the “Man with two faces”.  
What is the identity of the silver-haired girl who observes him…?  
  
A new serialization by the author of [Boku Girl](https://mangadex.org/title/10643/boku-girl)
description.ru:
В Токио происходит ряд странных убийств, когда у всех жертв проподает вся кровь.  
Микогами Кейджи, детектив, который хочет отомстить за свою возлюбленную, убитую   
10 лет назад, преследует преступника, именуемого «Человек с двумя лицами».  
Какова же личность седовласой девушки, которая наблюдает за ним?..   


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/cube_sa)

altTitles.ru: Персиковый мальчик, пришедший с другого побережья

altTitles.ja: ピーチボーイリバーサイド

description.en:
Sarutorine Aldike, or Sari, is a bright, cheerful princess who wants to go on an adventure because she is bored of her tiny little castle in the countryside. One day, a hoard of vicious demons known as “Oni” come knocking on her doorstep, threatening the lives of everyone in the Kingdom. Thankfully, they are saved by a lone traveler named Kibitsu Mikoto who slays these monsters with a mysterious “Peach Eye”. Shocked by the dangers of the outside world, Sari decides to set off on a journey of her own. Little did she know that she will set in motion a chain of events that will come to determine the fate of this magical world.  
  
Remake version of Cool Kyoushinsha’s popular webcomic of the same name.

altTitles.ja: 小さい僕の春

description.en: Suzuki Souta, a high school boy on the school volleyball team, is interested in his classmate Shinonome Asahi, a member of the girls' volleyball team. She thought of him as a good volleyball player, so she has been seeking him out every day. Souta was a keen volleyball player until junior high. However, because of his height, he could never become the spiker he longed to be. As a result, he got into the habit of giving up on things. Souta's high school life: Will he meekly accept what he cannot have? Or will he try to become a man who can stand with Asahi? Youth is a series of choices. Please, Souta, hang in there and do your best!

altTitles.th: เรื่องนี้ตำราไม่มีสอน

altTitles.ja: ぼくたちは勉強ができない

description.en:
Yuiga Nariyuki wasn't always a top-notch student; he had to study intensively to get where he is. Even so, he is constantly outperformed by literary genius Furuhashi and science whiz Ogata. When he's supposed to be preparing for college entrance exams, Yuiga is ordered by the headmaster to tutor both these girls—in the subjects with which they struggle the most! How will he manage to get results out of these geniuses?  


---
description.it:
Nariyuki Yuiga è determinato ad impegnarsi al massimo pur di ottenere una borsa di studio che sia in grado di sollevare la sua povera famiglia dalle spese scolastiche. Qualunque cosa lui faccia, tuttavia, sembra non riuscire mai a superare le sue due compagne di banco: Rizu Ogata è infatti un genio nelle materie scientifiche, mentre Fumino Furuhashi, è incredibilmente portata per le materie letterarie. Nariyuki si rivolge quindi al preside dell'istituto, il quale gli propone un patto: il ragazzo dovrà fare da tutor ad entrambe le ragazze per gli esami di ingresso all'università! Sorprendentemente, infatti, Rizu ha intenzione di iscriversi a una facoltà di letteratura, mentre Fumino a una di scienze.  


---
description.ru: Юга Нариюки отлично учится, да и оценки у него выше среднего. Он бы вполне мог считать себя одарённым, если бы не два "но". А точнее две. Огата Ризу — математический гений, чей мозг способен просчитать все формулы. Фурухаси Фумино — мастер слова, чьи произведения могут затронуть даже самое чёрствое сердце. Обе они не дают нашему герою стать первым в школе. А зачем ему это? Он хочет попасть в уникальную программу, названную "Особая VIP рекомендация". Она позволит ему поступить в абсолютно любой университет страны безо всяких помех. И ему выпадает шанс попасть в эту программу. Только вот есть одно условие - нужно стать репетитором этих двух гениев. Но зачем же этим гениям репетитор?

title.en: Salaryman ga Isekai ni Ittara Shitennou ni Natta Hanashi

altTitles.en: Headhunted to Another World: From Salaryman to Big Four!

altTitles.ja: サラリーマンが異世界に行ったら四天王になった話

altTitles.en: A Story About a Salaryman Who Goes to Another World and Becomes One of the Four Heavenly Kings

altTitles.tr: Başka Bir Dünyaya Yöneldi: Maaşlı Adamdan Göksel Krala!

altTitles.ru: Из корпоративного раба в приспешники демона

altTitles.en: Office Worker Has Become “Big Four” in the Different World.

description.en: Dennosuke Uchimura is a simple Salaryman who one day is run over, and left in the street to die, however, when he regains consciousness, it seems as though he was summoned to another world by the Demon King himself, who offers him a position as one of his Four Heavenly Kings. Can Dennosuke survive as a servant of the Demon King, and meet his expectations?

Emilone was a well-known actress before she got transported to another world and became a saint.  
She got a plausible name of 'the Holy Lady Who Moved Dimensions', but she didn't receive any attention. This happened because all the Empire's attention was on Princess Ronella.  
As a result, Emilone, who was devoted to her work as a saint, accidentally discovered the secret of Princess Ronella. The innocent and kind facades of the princess were all acting!  
This can be pretty fun. Wouldn't I be able to break my boring routine when I got closer to Princess Ronella?  
Emilone made a dangerous decision for fun.

title.en: Suicide Notes Laid on the Table

altTitles.ja: 遺書､公開。

description.en: Everyone in Class 2-D of Kairei Private Middle School receives an e-mail at the beginning of the school year detailing a "class hierarchy." But the number one ranked Tsubaki Himeyama clears away the unrest this causes with her sunny disposition. Normalcy returns to the class... until Himeyama is found to have killed herself on campus. And once her classmates return from her funeral, they find suicide notes addressed to them on their desks! Will these notes expose the darkness class 2-D conceals?!

title.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Part 8: JoJolion (Official Colored)

altTitles.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Part 8: JoJolion - Digital Colored Comics
JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken Part 8: JoJolion (Official Colored)

altTitles.es-la: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Parte 8 : JoJolion - Color Digital

altTitles.ru: Невероятные Приключения ДжоДжо Часть 8: Джоджолион (цветная версия)

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険
ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 ジョジョリオン
ジョジョリオン
ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第8部 ジョジョリオン カラー版
JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: JoJolion

description.en: In 2011, childhood friends Yasuho Hirose and Joushuu Higashikata discover a naked man buried in the ground just outside the town of Morioh. The man has no memory of his name or previous life; the only thing he remembers about himself is how to use his Stand, a supernatural ability that takes the form of a humanoid creature. The stranger is quickly given a name, Jousuke, and Joushuu's father Norisuke decides to adopt him into the Higashikata household until he can find his own home.  As Jousuke begins to investigate his past, it becomes apparent that he is no ordinary amnesiac. There is much more to his identity than he first suspected, and, as he is thrust into a series of high-stakes Stand battles, he soon begins unravelling a deadly conspiracy that encompasses the entire town.
description.hu:
A Jojo no Kimyou na Bouken sorozat nyolcadik történetíve.

A nagy japán földrengést követően Morioh-t hatalmas földkiugrások sújtották, ahogy helyiek nevezik, Szemes falak. A vizsgálat ellenére a szakmai becslések üresen maradtak. Eközben egy fiatal lány, Yasuho Hirose egy férfit talál a földbe temetve,aki jellegzetes csillagalakú anyajeggyel és mélyre hatoló harapásnyomokkal rendelkezik. A férfit, aki az aminézia jeleit mutatja, egy helyi család hozta ide és adta neki a Josuke Higashikata nevet, azonban a különös események nem maradnak abba, egyik a másikat halmozza leginkább és hamarosan a standként ismert talány előbukkan, hogy eloszlassa a zavarságok felhőit. 

- 2013-ban a 17-dik Japan Media Arts Festivalon megnyerte a fődíjat a manga kategóriában.
description.pl:
Ósma część serii JoJo's Bizarre Adventure. 
Począwszy od trzęsień ziemi w 2011, w miasteczku Morioh zaczęły występować rozległe uskoki, nazwane Murami Oczu. Pomimo przeprowadzonych badań, przyczyna ich wzniesienia pozostaje nieznana. W międzyczasie młoda dziewczyna imieniem Yasuho Hirose znajduje zakopanego mężczyznę ze znamieniem w kształcie gwiazdy otoczonym śladami ugryzienia. Mężczyzna przyjąwszy łatkę człowieka z amnezją, został przyjęty do mieszkającej w pobliżu rodziny oraz nadano mu imię - Jōsuke Higashikata. Jednakże, tajemnicze wydarzenia wcale nie ustają, a zagadkowe Standy dopełniają poczucie zdezorientowania.
- Czarno-biała wersja wygrała główną nagrodę w kategorii mangi w 17 edycji Japońskiego Festiwalu Sztuki w 2013 roku.
description.es-la:
El arco de la octava historia de la serie: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure.

Tras el gran terremoto del este en Japón, Morioh ha sido golpeado por grandes protuberancias de tierra conocidas por los lugareños como Los Muros con Ojos. A pesar de la investigación, las estimaciones profesionales quedan vacías. Mientras tanto, la joven Yasuho Hirose, descubre a un hombre enterrado en la tierra, este posee una distintiva marca de nacimiento en forma de estrella junto con marcas de mordeduras profundas. El hombre, que ha contraído un caso básico de amnesia, es acogido por una familia local y recibe el nombre de Jousuke Higashikata, sin embargo, los eventos misteriosos no pueden evitar que se acumulen unos sobre otros y pronto ese enigma conocido como "stand", emerge para complementar la gran nube de confusión.

° Ganó el Gran Premio en la categoría de manga en el 17º Festival de Artes de Medios de Japón en 2013.

altTitles.ja: 限界独身女子(26)ごはん

altTitles.vi: Bữa ăn đạm bạc của bà chị (26) độc thân

altTitles.es-la: Comidas de despedida de soltera de 26 años
El sufrimiento de una Doomer no amada de 26 años

altTitles.en: The Meals Of A Single Woman (26) At Her Limit
The Meals Of a 26 Year Old Single At Her Limit
The Suffering of a 26 Year Old Unloved Female Doomer

altTitles.pt-br: O Sofrimento de uma Doomer de 26 Anos Não Amada
Refeições de uma mulher solteira no limite (26 anos)

description.en: Hiiragi-san is a single woman who is exhausted from work and life. No matter how depressed she is, she always ends up hungry.
description.ja:
鬱、孤独、たまに飯。
仕事につかれ、生活につかれた限界独身女子の柊さん。どんなに憂鬱でも、おなかだけは空いてしまうようです。
description.vi: Cuộc sống hằng ngày cùng những bữa ăn đạm bạc của bà chị độc thân thất nghiệp chán đời.
description.es-la: La Sr. Hiiragi, es una chica marginalmente soltera que está cansada del trabajo y la vida. No importa cuán deprimido esté, mi estómago parece estar vacío.
description.pt-br: Hiiragi-san é uma mulher solteira, exausta do trabalho e da vida. Não importa o quão deprimida ela esteja, ela sempre acaba ficando com fome.

altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック
アンデッドアンラック カラー版

altTitles.vi: Bất tử và bất hạnh (Bản màu)

description.en: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…
